text:
Hi everybody :rocket:

I'm looking very specifically for a HubSpot developer who's got *experience building sites using the SprocketRocket Theme.* 
*Please only reach out if you have this experience, and can share links to validate.*

Preliminary brief:

• It's a very simple, 11 page site
    ◦ Most pages are comprised of 5 modules, and there's lots of repetition in terms of module composition throughout the site
• All the copy is done
• The site has been designed in Figma with Sprocket Rocket in mind.
*In terms of rates, we're a startup company and I'm based in South Africa, so we're looking for someone who works between $25 - $40 per hour depending on experience*
Hi Ted, Sending you DM for further discussion.

Hi Ted,

I have developed 7+ HubSpot themes and also worked with a couple of South African clients <https://www.hupla.co/>
